alert.note: Alert for Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 30 at 7:38PM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Michigan... Michigamme River near Crystal Falls (Michigamme) affecting Iron County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Monday afternoon at 100 PM CDT. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by excessive rainfall are occurring. * WHERE...Michigamme River near Crystal Falls (Michigamme). * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, 2700 cfs - River exceeds bankfull stage * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
